original_text: Then Mordecai returned to the king's gate. But Haman hurried to his house, mourning and with his head covered.
korean_text: 모르드개는 다시 대궐 문으로 돌아오고 하만은 번뇌하여 머리를 싸고 급히 집으로 돌아가서

sentences.original_text: Then Mordecai returned to the king's gate.
But Haman hurried to his house,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하만은 자기 집으로 서둘러 갔고,

sentences.original_text: mourning and with his head covered.
